segments.text: I'm furious looking at this mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there polishing a stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like crazy, water everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle and acts like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are idiots, climbing on a stool that's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is grabbing cookies like he owns the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, encouraging this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they be so reckless in their own home?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage, broken bonesâ€”it's all waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but this kitchen is a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe adults let things get this out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR
